body.name: DeerValley Two-Piece Elongated Toilet ADA 17.9”High Toilet for Bathrooms Comfortable, Power Flush 1.28 GPF Toilet, 1000g Map High-Efficiency White Toilet 12" Rough in
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 56 mins
features: ADA Toilet Height Seat: Our two-piece toilet is meticulously designed with a seat height of 17 15/16 inches from the floor, offering a more comfortable experience by reducing strain when sitting down or standing up.

Efficient Powerful Flush: The 1.28 gallons per flush enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The hidden water holes provide a 360-degree jet that creates a spiral scrubbing action, effectively removing dirt and grime from hard-to-reach corners.

Premium Bathroom Toilet: This two-piece toilet is crafted from ceramic and undergoes high-temperature firing. The toilet glaze is highly porcelainized, resulting in a low water absorption rate. This feature helps protect the toilet from easily cracking and enhances its overall durability.

Soft Close Seat Toilet: The toilet lid of our product is designed to close quietly and slowly, ensuring a peaceful experience, especially during nighttime use. The high-quality toilet seat is equipped with a soft-closing mechanism, providing added convenience and preventing any slamming noises.

Modern Toilet: Our toilet adds a touch of elegance and sleekness to any bathroom. Whether it is for residential or commercial use, this toilet's versatile and stylish appearance makes it a perfect choice for enhancing the aesthetic appeal of any space.
body.description: compact small two piece toilet for bathroom ADA hight

productInformation.value: #76,689 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #7 in Two-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and trusted company!
reviews.reviewText: The Deer Valley elongated toilet came in perfect condition. Installed it the same day and it's in perfect working order! Easy to install. The seat goes down easily on its own, very quiet. Flush is fast, fills fast, and better than my other American Standard toilet! Deer Valley really cares about their customer, as the packaging was outstanding to insure that the products gets to you safely without damage. The only thing you need to buy separately, is a water line toilet hose. Everything else in the description is included. I will be purchasing other products from them in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really like this tolet. Well packed with fast shipping. Easy installation. Works fantastic. Really like the auto seat and lid close. Only thing I would change is the lid, it's a bit light to sit on and I'm only 160.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality toilet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, easy installation and powerful flush!!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet replaced the old round, low toilet that was in my place for years. The height is great for us Seniors and the seat comfortable. The installation was very easy!! It was also one of the least expensive units available!! It’s a keeper!😎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We loved the toilet, it fit perfectly in our bathroom. The height of the toilet is great as well. It suits everyone in our household. The only problem we had with the toilet, is the pump that sits inside. It would not flush., it could have been our water pressure because after we put a heavy duty one in, the toilet is working perfectly. But as far as the toilet, we recommend it for anyone who is interested in buying a toilet. it flushes well. And the color is just beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with the way this toilet was shipped. It was enclosed in a sturdy styrofoam container. The tank, toilet, seat, wax ring, flushing mechanism were all individually encased within the container. And every item had the installation instructions, hardware inside a plastic bag with each part. Really impressive.And the toilet works. lol. The seat closes softly and it flushes quickly and quieter than most. If I could say I love a toilet, I’d say I love my ADA toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deer Valley Toilet
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Directions on point. Just make sure to tank screws are tightened to prevent leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not great to install.
reviews.reviewText: Installed according to the manual. Leaked when water was turned on. The washers included were worthless, the screws were worthless. Finally had to use washers and screws from old toilet. We finally got it to quit leaking. Otherwise the toilet looks nice but the seat is cheap plastic.
